price: I naređeno mi je: "Predaj se pravoj vjeri iskreno, i nikako ne budi iz reda onih koji Allahu u obožavanju druge pridružuju,
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfan walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
